definitions.definition: One of the brightest stars in the sky, now recognised to be a binary star in the constellation Taurus (alpha (α) Tauri); an orange giant , 68 light years from Earth .

main_definition: ( astronomy ) One of the brightest stars in the sky, now recognised to be a binary star in the constellation Taurus (alpha (α) Tauri); an orange giant , 68 light years from Earth . [from 14th c.]
